content.question: Which of the following best explains why the Universal Negro Improvement Association (UNIA) developed?

choices.label: To unite all people of African descent
To encourage people of African descent to migrate to urban areas
To create a Black aesthetic reflected in the arts and broader Black culture
To provide postsecondary education to Black people in the United States

content.answer: To unite all people of African descent

skill.text: 1.B: Identify and explain the context of a specific event, development, or process.
